title: Campobasso
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Campobasso, from a wide variety of genres like Adult Contemporary, Italian, News, Pop and Talk.  Enjoy stations such as Radio Orizzonte, Radio 24 Campobasso, Radio Valentina FM and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radios.title: Radio Orizzonte
radios.profile_slogan: Accende la tua voglia di musica!

radio_info.short: Radio Orizzonte is a broadcast radio station in Campobasso, Molise, Italy, providing Adult Contemporary and Pop music.

radios.title: Radio 24 Campobasso
